org.xflatdb.xflat.convert.converters

Class JAXBPojoConverter

    PojoConverter

    public class JAXBPojoConverter
extends Object
implements PojoConverter
    A PojoConverter that extends a ConversionService to convert all unknown objects to and from Element using JAXB. Any conversion which
    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • extend

        public ConversionService extend(ConversionService service)
        Extends the given conversion service with a JAXB conversion service. A JAXB Marshaller and Unmarshaller will be created for classes that cannot be converted using the given conversion service.
        Specified by:
        extend in interface PojoConverter
        Parameters:
        service - The service to extend
        Returns:
        A new service that extends the functionality of the given service.

      • idSelector

        public org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<Object> idSelector(Class<?> clazz)
        Guesses an alternate ID selector for the class based on how JAXB would map the ID property. If the class has no ID property, a null expression is returned.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class for which an alternate ID selector is required.
        Returns:
        The alternate ID selector, or null if the class hass no ID property.

      • addJAXBConverters

        public static <T> void addJAXBConverters(JAXBContext context,
                         Class<T> baseClass,
                         ConversionService registerTo)
                              throws JAXBException
        Adds converters to and from JDOM Element for the given class. This gives you more control over the JAXBContext than just allowing the JAXBPojoConverter to create a default JAXBContext for your pojos.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic type of the pojo which should be convertible.
        Parameters:
        context - The JAXBContext created to map the pojo to XML.
        baseClass - The pojo class which should be convertible.
        registerTo - The conversion service to which the converters should be added.
        Throws:
        JAXBException - If an error occurs when creating the marshaller or unmarshaller.
